about.summary: Command line and full screen utilities for browsing procfs, a "pseudo" file system dynamically generated by the kernel to provide information about the status of entries in its process table.

name: procps-ng
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '3.3.15' %}

package:
  name: 'procps-ng'
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://gitlab.com/procps-ng/procps/-/archive/v{{ version }}/procps-v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 14dfa751517dd844efa9f492e3ad8071f908a269c6aea643b9a1759235fa2053

build:
  number: 0
  skip: True  # [not linux]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - autoconf
    - automake
    - libtool
    - make
    - pkg-config
  host:
    - ncurses
  run:
    - ncurses

test:
  commands:
    - $PREFIX/bin/ps
    - $PREFIX/bin/w
    - $PREFIX/bin/free

about:
  home: https://gitlab.com/procps-ng/procps
  license: GPL-2.0
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: 'Command line and full screen utilities for browsing procfs, a "pseudo" file system dynamically generated by the kernel to provide information about the status of entries in its process table.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dpryan79
